wikipedia_page.main: Paul Hay (born 14 November 1980 in Glasgow, Scotland) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays for Scottish Third Division side Clyde.

response: *After Hay's release by Stirling, Soccerbase linked to his namesake Paul Hay on its match result pages. This makes it looks as though Chris was still at the club in 2006–07 and 2007–08. It also explains why Paul Hay's Soccerbase page has no results for either season.
Paul Hays or Hayes may refer to:
* Paul Hayes (antiques expert) (born 1970), English antiques expert
